籤詩版本二:
Ruwan sanyi da miya mara zafi, ba sanyi ko zafi ba sai dami
Don yin wani abu a duniya, don zama mai ƙarfi a kowane nau'in fasaha
詩意:
Wannan hexagram alama ce ta kyakkyawan amfani da abubuwa.
Komai yana da kwanciyar hankali kuma yana da kyau.
解曰: An yi wa fursunonin afuwa. Cuta ta haɗu da likita mai kyau. Neman arziki da bege. Umarni masu daraja.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ceto na Lintong
Daular Sui Marigayi. Sarki Li Yuan na daular Tang ya wuce ta hanyar dasa bishiyar da ke gindin tsaunin Lintong, ba zato ba tsammani, wasu jiga-jigan mutane marasa adadi sun fito daga dajin, inda suka tare hanya da dogayen mashi da gatari, da nufin kashe su. An kewaye Li Yuan kuma yana da matukar muhimmanci.
A wannan lokacin, Shubao yana gab da yin barci a Haikalin Wuyuan, ya yi mamaki sa’ad da ya ji ƙarar mutane da dawakai suna ihun mutuwa a wajen haikalin. Nan take ya hau dokinsa da gudu ya nufi tsakiyar dutsen, sai ga hayaki da kura ko'ina a gindin dutsen, sai aka yi ta kururuwar kisa.
Da saurin walƙiya, Shu Bao ya shiga ya kashe mutane da dama a jere, abokan gaba sun gudu ta ko'ina.
An ceto dangin Li Yuan. Wato Sarkin Daular Tang ya sake amfani da shi. Ya zama gwarzon da ya kafa daular Tang.
聖意: Gidan iyali ya zama alheri ga kansa, neman arziki, an gama ciniki, an yi aure, Liujia, masu tafiya a ƙasa maza sun isa gona, tsutsotsin siliki sun balaga, an wadata dabbobi shida, an sami jama'a, an tarwatsawa, ƙaura an yi niyya, abubuwan da suka ɓace. an same su, cututtuka suna lafiya, tsaunuka da kaburbura suna da kyau.
